Class Celerity::Listener
In: lib/celerity/listener.rb
Parent: Object

This class is used to wrap some of the listeners available from HtmlUnit‘s WebClient.

Methods

add_listener   error   handleAlert   handleAttachment   handleConfirm   handlePrompt   new   notify   remove_listener   statusMessageChanged   warning   webWindowClosed   webWindowContentChanged   webWindowOpened

add_listener(type, &block)

Add a listener block for one of the available types. @see Celerity::Browser#add_listener

handleConfirm(page, message)

interface ConfirmHandler

The returned value is determined by the last registered :confirm listener proc. If it is nil, return true, otherwise return that value as a boolean.

@see Browser#confirm
